name: CyberMedia Research
overview:
Research, consulting and Advisory services in multiple verticals

CyberMedia Research (CMR) is a premier research and consulting firm offering customers (vendors, OEMs, service providers, channel partners, industry associations and governments) strategic and tactical insights in the form of market intelligence, market sizing, market ecosystem mapping, advisory and go-to-market services. CMR research and advisory services cover the domains of Information Technology, Telecommunications, Semiconductor and new opportunity areas such as Government, Electronics, Smart Infrastructure, Healthcare, Energy and Entrepreneurship, as well as Consumer and Global markets. CMR provides understanding of new ‘tech-knowledge’ industry domains, maps key sectoral trends, develops definite viewpoints on emerging markets and provides in-depth consumer insights.
